name: azure-storage-table
label: Azure Storage Table
description: Azure Table storage is a service that stores non-relational structured data (also known as structured NoSQL data) in the cloud, providing a key/attribute store with a schemaless design. these connector helps you to create, update, delete, query on azure storage table

fields.title: Storage Account Name
fields.description: Name of the storage account from which you want to perform the automated operations.
fields.name: accountName

fields.title: Account SAS Token
fields.name: sas_token
fields.description: Account Shared Access Signature to perform automated operations on Storage Table Service.
fields.tooltip: Account Shared Access Signature to perform automated operations on Storage Table Service.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Table
operations.description: The Create Table operation creates a new table in a storage account.

parameters.title: Table Name
parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Table name to create new table.

operations.title: Delete Table
operations.description: The Delete Table operation deletes a table in a storage account.

parameters.title: Table Name
parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Table name to delete table.

operations.title: Query Table
operations.description: The Query Tables operation returns a list of tables under the specified account.

parameters.title: Query Filter
parameters.name: query_filter
parameters.description: Query expression.

parameters.title: Records Limit
parameters.name: records_limit
parameters.description: Retrieve top n tables.

operations.title: Insert Entity into Table
operations.description: The Insert Entity operation inserts a new entity into a table.

parameters.title: Table Name
parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Table name to insert entity into the table.

parameters.title: Partition Key
parameters.name: partition_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the partition within a given table.

parameters.title: Row Key
parameters.name: row_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for an entity within a given partition.

parameters.title: Entity Fields
parameters.name: entity_fields
parameters.description: Entity fields in JSON format: { "Key1": Value1, "Key2": Value2}.

operations.title: Query Entity into Table
operations.description: The Query Entities operation queries entities in a table.

parameters.title: Table Name
parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Table name to query on entity.

parameters.title: Partition Key
parameters.name: partition_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the partition within a given table.

parameters.title: Row Key
parameters.name: row_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for an entity within a given partition.

parameters.title: Query Filter
parameters.name: query_filter
parameters.description:
Filter Entities query expression.
Information about Query expression structure can be found here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/storageservices/querying-tables-and-entities#constructing-filter-strings.

parameters.title: Property Names
parameters.name: property_names
parameters.description: Provide comma separated property names

operations.title: Update Entity into Table
operations.description: Update an existing entity in a table. The Update Entity command does not replace the existing entity.

parameters.title: Table Name
parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Table name to update on entity.

parameters.title: Partition Key
parameters.name: partition_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the partition within a given table.

parameters.title: Row Key
parameters.name: row_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for an entity within a given partition.

parameters.title: Entity Fields
parameters.name: entity_fields
parameters.description: Entity fields in JSON format: { "Key1": Value1, "Key2": Value2}.

operations.title: Delete Entity into Table
operations.description: Delete an existing entity from a table.

parameters.title: Table Name
parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Table name to delete a entity.

parameters.title: Partition Key
parameters.name: partition_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the partition within a given table.

parameters.title: Row Key
parameters.name: row_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for an entity within a given partition.
